prompt.content: Using the Basic-Fit N.V. Annual Report for FY 2024, calculate the Underlying Price-to-Earnings (P/E) Ratio using the year-end 2024 share price. Round the final ratio to 2 decimal places.

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Uses share price at year-end 2024 = €22.58 as an input"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Uses the Diluted underlying net result per share = €0.65 as an input"},{"criteria":"Calculates 22.58 / 0.65 = 34.738...","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Calculates final Underlying Price-to-Earnings Ratio for FY 2024 = 34.74, rounded to exactly two decimal places","operator":"correctness"}]
